subject: Giro d''Italia (Bicycle Race)
Human Growth Hormone
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Everybody is buzzing about the latest innovation in cycling, even more of a performance enhancer than EPO, CERA or any blood booster.
